Screen.TooltipReference: Drop Item Here to Auto Equip

Button.TooltipReference: Click here to toggle whether the current item will gain experience.
Click here to set all items listed to collect experience.
Click here to set all items listed to NOT collect experience.

Page.TooltipReference: Expanded Bags: watch out for bags with less than 10 slots!

Button.TooltipReference: Click to create hard currency (items) of type highlighted.
Click here reclaim points from items of highlighted type.

Label.Text: **NOTE: There isn't a way to error check if you have an 8 slot or less bag in the inventory slot, so be mindful of the allowable slots in your bags before leaving the bank or zoning. If you put something in a slot that isn't actually there (putting something in slot 9 of an 8 slot bag), then when you zone, the item will appear on your cursor and if you've put multiple things in the wrong slot then they'll all go to your cursor but only the top most item will be kept with all others lost**
